title: Match the Song

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• In this game the switch user’s music knowledge is put to the test!
• Record "next" on one switch and "that's the singer!" on the other.
• Play a song, hold up one of the singer/band picture cards, and say who it is e.g., "Little Mix."
• If the switch user presses "next," put the current picture down and show the next one in the pile.
• If the switch user presses "that’s the singer!", check whether their guess is correct.
• If they guess correctly, they earn a point. Once they reach 5 points, they win a prize!

tooltipText: Play a song and use 2 switches to scan through images of singers/bands to play a music trivia game!
